content.rendered:
Whether you’re looking for something affordable or something high tech, these best Xiaomi phones for 2020 are bound to be your perfect match. Although not a huge brand, Xiaomi produces technology capable of offering you the latest technology and features. They’re growing quickly so you’ll want to get in there whilst prices stay low.

 

Xiaomi Redmi 9

As the latest release from Xiaomi, the Redmi 9 is currently top of the talks amongst Xiaomi fans. This isn’t the only reason people are talking about this device though. When you come to purchase the Xiaomi Redmi 9, you can choose between 32GB, 64GB and 128GB. This is one of the largest memory ranges from all of Xiaomi’s smartphones. By offering such a large range of storage options, you can find something that’s perfect for you without having no option but to pay for more. Whether you’re on a low budget or not, you can enjoy the Redmi 9.

This device also have a very powerful battery keeping it powered. Making sure you can enjoy the Redmi 9 all day is a 5020mAh battery. For hours, you’ll be able to go about your day thinking about the things that really matter, rather than your battery life. Xiaomi knows that having access to the rest of the world through your phone is one of the most important things. That’s why they’ve given this device such a powerful battery. It also supports fast charging 18W for those times when you do need to give it a quick power up.

 

Xiaomi Mi 10 Lite 5G

Nowadays, more and more people want a camera system that is better than ever before. Xiaomi have always had this at the front of their minds when designing a new device. With the Xiaomi Mi 10 Lite 5G, you can enjoy a quad lens camera set up, capable of some impressive things. This camera is going to produce photographs like you’ve never seen before. With the large screen, you can even edit them to make them your own. Create images that turn heads with very little effort but, what is this all down to?

Inside of this quad lens camera, you’ll find a 48MP main camera, 8MP ultra wide lens, 2MP depth sensor and a 2MP macro lens. You’ll find that most of your photos are captured with the main camera as this is the most versatile of them all. With no focal lengths or filters, your photos are super detailed. For something a little more creative and impressive, you’re going to want to try out the macro lens. This will allow you to zoom right in to your subject and capture detail unlike ever before. Discover new colours and textures with the Xiaomi Mi 10 Lite 5G.

 

Xiaomi Redmi Note 9

Xiaomi have a few different smartphone lines that they add to every year. One of their most popular is the Redmi Note range. Adding to it in 2020 is the Xiaomi Redmi Note 9. This is the lowest specification variant to hit the range this year but doesn’t mean it’s not impressive. With a 6.53 inch IPS LCD display, you’ve got plenty of space for the things that matter. As to not take away from this space, you’ll find that the selfie camera has now been reduced to a tiny punch hole and the edge bezels have been seriously reduced.

If you’re in search for a smartphone that’s easy to love, the Xiaomi Redmi Note 9 is perfect. Running on Android 10, the phone itself is so easy to use. You can enjoy navigating through the Note 9 with little effort. Find all your apps in one place and even sort them as you wish. Android 10 also means that you will get regular security updates to enjoy that the phone is free of any bugs or malicious malware. Not only does it offer a super user friendly experience but it also makes sure your data stays safe.

 

Xiaomi Mi 10

5G technology has moved on so quickly over the last year. With progressing connectivity, we need the technology to match. Xiaomi have been one manufacturer that was quick to enter the 5G world. With the Snapdragon 865 inside the Xiaomi Mi 10, you’re going to enjoy some serious speeds. You will of course need a 5G ready deal to match however, it will be worth the effort. Enjoy uninterrupted browsing, superfast downloads and even buffer free videos all from the comfort of your mobile. This chip also works to make sure your battery stays efficient and strong.

With the Xiaomi Mi 10, you get a really fresh design too. An all glass design offers a very clean, high end finish across the smartphone. This catches the light to really draw people’s attention in. To make sure you’re safe from any accidental bumps, Xiaomi have built the device with Gorilla Glass 5 too. You’re able to purchase the Xiaomi Mi 10 in Coral Green, Twilight Grey and Peach Gold, all offering a completely different style. Deciding whether you want a pop of colour or something more simple will help you to decide on which variant you need.

 

Xiaomi Redmi Note 9 Pro

As the latest high specification addition to the Note range, this device packs a powerful punch. On the back of the phone, you will find a quad lens camera setup. Inside this is a 64MP main camera, from where you’re going to take most of your photos. These will be high quality and full of detail. Next yup is an 8MP ultra wide camera, 5MP macro lens and a 2MP depth sensor. Each of these lenses provide you with a whole different shooting style to make your photos your own. You’ll also get auto focus, HDR and panorama included.

Keeping the phone powered is a 5020mAh battery, capable of holding hours of life in it. When you have the Xiaomi Redmi Note 9 Pro, you’ll never have to worry about a dead battery when there’s more to think about. A single charge will make sure that you’ve got access to the outside world for hours on end. Of course, you will need to regularly charge the phone to make sure that it’s got enough power to keep you going. When it comes to this, fast charging 30W will make sure to top up the battery in a matter of minutes.

 

Don’t think any of these best Xiaomi phones are for you? There are plenty more Xiaomi handsets you can check out. Even if Xiaomi isn’t the brand for you, we work with loads of other manufacturers, big and small.
